author: Stahly
description:
This weekend, a new season of Fantasy Football will kick off with the Blood Bowl: Third Season Edition starter set. Although I have never managed to play the "main" Blood Bowl game, I have played its "little brother" Blitz Bowl extensively instead. In this post, I present to you my collection of painted teams: Skaven, Undead, Orcs, Humans, and Dark Elves. Tutorials and tips are also included.

The post Showcase: Stahly’s Blitz Bowl team collection appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Stahly’s Blitz Bowl team collection
